definition: the rhythmic contraction and expansion of the arteries with each beat of the heart
details:
noun
- the rhythmic contraction and expansion of the arteries with each beat of the heart
= synonyms: beat
- (electronics) a sharp transient wave in the normal electrical state (or a series of such transients)
= example: (electronics) a sharp transient wave in the normal electrical state (or a series of such transients)
= synonyms: impulse
- a periodically recurring phenomenon that alternately increases and decreases some quantity
